title: Wild Card Weekend Recap with NFL (Super) Friends (Football 1/07)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by John Breech, Ryan Wilson and Sean Wagner-McGough to break down wild card weekend and discuss all the action. They take a look at the crazy ending to the Eagles-Bears game and debate whether or not the Eagles can take down the Saints (2:00), as well as playoff officiating concerns (15:00), the Chargers taking down the Ravens (21:00), if the Chargers can beat the Patriots (35:00), the Seahawks managing to cover against the Cowboys (43:30), the Cowboys being surprising touchdown underdogs against the Rams (53:15), the Colts steamrolling the Texans, if the Colts matchup well with the Chiefs (58:30) and the Super Bowl matchups we want to see (1:10:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
